settings.text:
Next Day Air shipping applies to in-stock items only. Call 1-855-951-4499 to verify stock and receive a NDA quote. Orders placed after 12:00PM EST are not guaranteed to be shipped same-day.

Tax Exempt: For tax exempt organizations registered in OHIO, please create an account and call us to mark your account as tax exempt. Have your tax exempt certificate ready to email when calling.

Collect Shipping: For collect shipping charges, please create an account and call 1-855-951-4499 to register your account with this option.
